extension.name: Content - Newsletter2Go
extension.author: Newsletter2Go
extension.description:
Newsletter2Go content plugin

To display Newsletter2Go inside articles please use one of the following short codes:

  • {newsletter2go} displays form embedded inside an article
  • {newsletter2go type=plugin} same as above but with type parameter
  • {newsletter2go type=popup} displays form in modal/popup window
  • {newsletter2go type=popup delay=5} same as above, but with delay parameter which represents delay in seconds before modal/popup window is displayed
